title: New: Wet – Deadwater
body:
Having taken six weeks or so off from posting due to end of university / dissertation stress times, it feels good to be back, and there’s hardly a more fitting track to return with than the long anticipated major label debut of **Wet**.

Having demonstrated colossal potential on their 2013 EP, the trio are set to release their debut LP, Don’t You, via Columbia, and play a one-off London show at Dalston Victoria on 17 June, tickets available from [tomorrow](http://www.livenation.co.uk/artist/wet-tickets?omq=wet). Check out stunning new track, _Deadwater_, below.
